page.title: 08A Typical Day
page.content: 0700 Mum and dad wake up first 0715 I arise and have breakfast, usually a boiled egg or toast. 0755 I bus 2 miles to school. 0850 Brother to school.Mum to work. 1000 Dad prepares the dinner. 1200 Brother home for dinner.I have a packed lunch. 1245 Brother back to school,Mum home. 1400 Dad goes to work at pit.Mum eats. 1510 I bus home from school.Watch T.V. 1530 Brother home.We change our clothes.Mum sets out tea things. 1540 We all have tea. 1600 Brother out to play.Mum and I do the dishes,before watching T.V. 2000 Brother comes in for bed. 2030 Brother and I have supper. 2100 We go to bed. 2200 Dad home from work.Mum makes supper.They both go to bed.
